lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: It gives me a chance to give back to the world that has given me so much.
lenders.occupational_info: In simple terms, I find jobs for people that make a difference in their careers to enable them to earn a good living for their families.

lenders.name: sherrin
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves is the key for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my children, my home and keep us all healthy and happy,

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help in any way possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a cleaning business and I also run a program working with the elderly.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: Everybody at one time or another needs a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: I want to see everyone self-sufficient.  This is one of the best ways to give back to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I supervise testing centers across the state of Arizona (USA) for the AZ Dept. of Education.  We administer the GED test (high school equivalency) and when passed, people can go on to college, get a job, start a business, etc.  Again, making them self-sufficient.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I am a business person and I know how hard it is to make a business grow.
lenders.occupational_info: I help individuals, couples, and families with their relational problems.

lenders.name: Linda Jean
lenders.loan_because: of the stories.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I write training programs, and I also teach English to immigrates here in the United States.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: It really works!

lenders.name: Schyryl
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: As an analyst/developer, I design, create, customize and support applications that are used by business users like Portfolio Accountants, Traders and Investment Managers. Outside work, I love to spend time with my husband and two wonderful kids.  As a family we love to travel and spend time with our friends.  The Lord has blessed us and we hope that by lending money to entrepreneurs in need we are able to touch their lives even though they live far from us.  I learned that even as low as $25 can go a long way in helping other people.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: I have great respect and admiration for hardworking individuals, especially under difficult circumstances.  What a wonderful way to make a difference!

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: It is a way of being "in service"

lenders.name: Chris & John
lenders.loan_because: Our spirits are kindred with entrepreneurs everywhere.  We remember how the smallest things helped us in the beginning.  We want to return the favor.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach others about business and how business finance and taxation works.

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.loan_because: Is a way to say Thank You God for all the daily blessings.
lenders.occupational_info:
Financial Analyst, mother, wife and student.
This are a few of all the jobs I have.

lenders.name: OWD
lenders.loan_because: We all need someone to lean on.
lenders.occupational_info: Electronics technician

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: Never doubt that a small group of committed people can change the world - it's the only thing that has.

lenders.name: Jake
lenders.loan_because: All that I have is from the Lord God almighty, and he calls us all to share what he has given us.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a dairy farm, where we milk cows and sell the raw milk to a milk factory that produces many things like cheese, sour cream, butter, and powdered milk.

lenders.name: Luxaco
lenders.loan_because: I believe that you get back much more than you ever give.I think it is time we all do what we can for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a  business person who has many ecommerce websites and web directories.

lenders.name: Towanda
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is one of the best programs I have ever seen.  It is great to see that the money I loan is going directly to the cause.

lenders.name: Judi
lenders.loan_because: We can all make a change one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a Registered Nurse for the past 40 years.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and build voice, data, video, and control networks for the construction industry.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: We were always taught to help someone less fortunate than ourselves and this is a great way of doing that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired substitute teacher. I also have taught cooking courses and cooked in restuarants.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I've always wondered how I can make a difference to people in such a far away place from me.  I am pleased to know that I can help directly.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people within an exercise system called Pilates.  I hope that what I do with them helps them feel good about their bodies and being physical.

lenders.name: Sawyer
lenders.loan_because:
My mom takes really good care of me, and handles all my finances.  She knows that I want babies all over the world to have the best chace and the way to do that is to make sure their mommies have some money.    

I hope that the money my mommy gives will help other mothers take control of their lives and give their children a good and promising future.

Go Mommies!
lenders.occupational_info: I spend all day playing, eating and generally making a mess.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help someone get ahead.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research about life in 18th century America for a museum/historic house.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: I can help others in a non-invasive, constructive manner.
lenders.occupational_info: I make websites for a law firm.

lenders.name: Mollie & Hannah
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people.

lenders.name: Rocky
lenders.loan_because: Love

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: Even in this small way, I can make a big difference in someones life, and do so without a hand out. So much better for someones self respect.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: There is no one I respect more than the entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: Complex litigation.

lenders.name: theresa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those that are helping themselves make a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am self employed and help people buy houses by helping them get a loan from the bank.

lenders.name: M
lenders.loan_because: I may not have a lot, but I'm better off  then others. Sometimes you need to lend a hand to pull another up onto their feet.

lenders.name: Erika
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a server  and I enjoy my work.I plan to go back to college soon.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: my parents were small business people and my mom would be happy, that I can in a small way pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: I go to peoples homes when the are sick and injuried and help them and then take them to the hospital

lenders.name: Gilbert
lenders.loan_because: I believe that each person can make a difference in the world we live in. We a so lucky and we don't even know it. It's time to give that luck to somebody else.
lenders.occupational_info: Well, I've been raised in a restaurant. It was obvious for me that I wanted to continue in that branch. I'm a waiter and I love being in contact with the public.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: "Hands that help are holier than lips that pray." - Sai Baba

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference every way that I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the man.

lenders.name: Amazing WIZ Kids
lenders.loan_because: The money goes directly to the people that need it.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: It gives me great pleasure to be able to help someone who needs and is deserving  of my help.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired Nurse

lenders.name: Treva
lenders.occupation: Rescue Fire Protection / CPR / EMT/ Specialist

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because: I can't change the whole world at once but this offers a bite size way to start.
lenders.occupational_info: I can't quit my day job but I like to paint.

lenders.name: Delores
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to support our worldwide community.

lenders.name: Sheri
lenders.loan_because: I believe that Kiva is a reputable organization that can see the money gets where it will do the most good.
lenders.occupational_info: Most would understand what a teacher is.  Though that part of my life is now finished I still do some freelance work with a foundation that supports nutrition programs for school children.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a Public Helth Student attending university

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: because I want to

lenders.name: Melanie

lenders.name: Fauve

lenders.name: tom
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see someone suceed and have a better life and help there family , I know if they were in my shoe they would do the same !!!
lenders.occupational_info: I take information from clients that wanna buy a home or a commercial property and see if they would fit the lenders guildlines to lend out money to them and money back to repay the loan note back.

lenders.name: Mel
lenders.loan_because: I know the struggles of being an entrepreneur. Also, God has blessed me, so I am commissioned by him to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the women's clothing business.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate to live in the U.S.  The money I loan is relatively insignificant to me, but has the ability to change the lives of those I loan it to.
lenders.occupational_info: Mama of two boys.

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: I have visited and volunteered in many of the areas in need of loans and want to continue to help when I'm not physically there.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in corporate marketing for an on-demand software company

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hard working people that deserve a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that distributes drugs to customers when they need it.  I help my company find ways to improve the process and help the customers.

lenders.name: andrea
lenders.loan_because: i am called to help others!

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: because we all need to live together in this world

lenders.name: Candice
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a valuable vehicle by which I can help others who "have a plan to help themselves".    It's just so painful to think of parents not being able to provide life's basic needs for their children.  Why shouldn't I help others who have never had the opportunities that I have had all my life.  I've had to get through difficult times, but nothing in comparison to the obsticles that some of these people have to overcome on a daily basis, just to exist.

lenders.name: Rajan
lenders.loan_because: Would like to see hardworking and honest entrepreneurs achieving their goals in life!
lenders.occupational_info: Property letting. Providing comfortable accommodation for the students and luxury accommodation the for working professionals in UK.

lenders.name: Alana
lenders.loan_because: it's good to finally be able to help other people!

lenders.name: Dolores & Curtis
lenders.loan_because: I care about people and would love to see other people doing the same thing

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: Providing capital to small businesses is a direct way to enhance the lives of people around the world and build a truly global economy
lenders.occupational_info: I work with companies to help them develop plans to improve their financial success, and I invest money in those companies to help them grow.

lenders.name: Captain EyePatch
lenders.loan_because: I be a pirate with a heart of gold... but if anyone let's that out, I be comin' ta' gut ye like a fish! Aye, so says I!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Plyin' the stormy seas with nay, nuthin' but me heart's compass to guide me through Neptune's wrathful obstacles... arrrrrrrr, but me cutlass is sharp & me hook even keener!

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It's sooo fun!  And also because I'm a little bit addicted to this site now...
lenders.occupational_info: Completing doctorate in social psychology at the University of Calgary, in Calgary, Alberta.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.  I have learned that "you can only keep what you have by giving it away" (or in this case, loaning it).
lenders.occupational_info: I assist departments within hospitals to increase their efficiency while reducing risk.

lenders.name: Joost
lenders.loan_because: I hope I am helping people around the world taking control over their lives
lenders.occupational_info: Owner of a consultancy company in renewable energy

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the inherent good that is in people and that resourcefulness coupled with kindness can make a big difference,

lenders.name: NFernandez
lenders.loan_because: I'm inspired by people's hard work and aspirations. I want to help other people.

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: it's an easy way to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Worked in high tech for 19 years.

lenders.name: Minelly
lenders.loan_because: its good to care about others
lenders.occupational_info: special eduation/middle school teacher :) mostly science

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: ...it is the RIGHT thing to do.  Being able to support and see someone follow a dream to create a better life...well, that is pretty cool.  This is a great way to connect to our "global family."
lenders.occupational_info: I'm very lucky to be able to stay at home with my son.

lenders.name: Two Wolves
lenders.loan_because: I believe that even the smallest contribution is inspiration!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large store where my main focus is customer service.

lenders.name: Andrew's family
lenders.loan_because: If not me, who?  If not now, when?  Everyone deserves to be believed in!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am the vice president of a company that provide services to handicapped people.  I also coach wrestling, football, and baseball.

lenders.name: Rapid Tag & Label
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it is an inexpensive way to make a difference and help others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We make all types of clothing labels. Like woven labels, printed labels and hangtags.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help to get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently stay home and take care of my son.

lenders.name: Father Gerald Mullally
lenders.loan_because: "The one who does not love his brother whom he has seen,cannot love God whom he has not seen."
lenders.occupational_info: Church pastor

lenders.name: Jared
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those, as I have been truly blessed!
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I sell and buy homes for a living where we live!

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: I care that people get the chance to do something they love.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find their dream home.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to meet their potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a full-time student at New York University in New York CIty, studying history, law, and social justice. I will also be working part-time in a New York City school as a classroom aide.

lenders.name: Geri & Nicole, Bruce
lenders.loan_because: I have learned as a single parent the struggles that come along with providing for your children. To help someone provide for themselves and their family is the best way of saying "It can and will be better"
lenders.occupational_info: I buy raw land and get it through the government systems then sell to a builder for the purpose of new homes

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I believe people are the best architects of their destinies when they have opportunity and that opportunity should not be determined by the randomness of a person's birthplace. I like to help women in particular as a form of gratitude for the blessings I've been granted in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sweets in all variety for restaurants.

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: i want to help
lenders.occupational_info: i create skin care with plant, fruit & seed oils.

lenders.loan_because: Karma!

lenders.name: chris

lenders.occupational_info: Event producer

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: When you give you get.  I want to keep the blessings going in my life.  A closed fist doesn't let anything out, nor does it let anything in.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: In order to keep it I must give it away
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a retired Canadian, but I own a home in Costa Rica . My partner and I now live in Costa Rica for most of the year.
She is also a retired Canadian

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: I bolive the every one needs the tool's to go forward in life.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: It's the next best thing to actually going to developing countries and volunteering.

lenders.name: Rusty from Alaska
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a change in someone else's life. I am an Alaskan Eskimo and I take my lead from my mother when it comes to building a community.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I work in the hospitality industry but in the past, my work in Alaska was IT support to some of the top world-wide companies. Soon, changes will be coming, I hope you are part of it.

lenders.name: Samantha Selvais
lenders.occupational_info: translator/technical writer

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I know that there are people who will always need help more than I ever will.
lenders.occupational_info: None now. In America, if you are determined,but not really educated that much, when you reach an older age {59} sometimes you are replaced with some one younger. In Michigan, you can be laid off just because ! It is called an "at will" state. The employer does not need a reason.

lenders.name: Alonzo
lenders.loan_because:
I want to sow into people who believe in working for themsleves. 

Proverbs 19:17 
   He that hath pity upon the poor lendeth unto the LORD; and that which he hath given will he pay him again.

Deuteronmy 28:12
  The LORD shall open unto thee his good treasure, the heaven to give the rain unto thy land in his season, and to bless all the work of thine hand: and thou shalt lend unto many nations, and thou shalt not borrow.

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because: It's such an easy and smart way to help people in an empowering way.

lenders.name: Vũ
lenders.loan_because: trying to slide underneath the pearly gates.
lenders.occupational_info: scientist developing a malaria vaccine

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I am all for helping someone who wants to help themselves make a better life.  The money is not important, but the livelihood is.  I have taught my children that ANYTHING  is possible, and we can all use some help to attain our dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I think they already know what it is to be a mother or a health care worker... I am a nurturer and a daughter of God, and my purpose is to do the right thing, and I mean that in all humility.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of being able to help others stand on their own.  I can't afford to give large amounts but in this way I still feel that I can help someone accomplish their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I work from home and type medical reports from doctor's dictations, for hospitals and doctor's offices, that is done over the Internet.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: if every one of us just helped out other people, no matter their race, color, beliefs, or lifestyle the world could become a much happier, decent place and maybe we could all learn to live together instead of destroying each other and our environment.
lenders.occupational_info: I design makeup for theatrical shows, art pieces, etc.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: It's fun and I want to empower women.

lenders.name: laurie
lenders.loan_because: I have had a chance, now it is time for someone else's chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from my career, but now am raising my young niece.  My work is that of a parent.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: God has given me the gifts to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with individuals that have different disabilities.  I live with them full time and am trying to teach them how to live independently.  It is a very challenging job, but also very rewarding!

lenders.name: Mitchell
lenders.loan_because: I can.  In the film business you spent half your time, simply wondering where the money's going to come from.....and that's just to make a movie.  No one should have to wonder where the money will come from to feed a their family or to have a roof over their heads.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am writer and that's my first love in the industry.  I still read and critique a lot of scripts but lately, I find myself in the role of Producer a lot more and I enjoy the give and take with other film makers.  Being even a small part of seeing to it that someone's project comes together is a pretty rewarding place to be in.

speersml@hotmail.com

http://profile.myspace.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=user.viewprofile&friendid=61916986

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.

lenders.name: andi
lenders.loan_because: “He who is kind to the poor lends to the LORD, and he will reward him for what he has done.”  Proverbs 19:17

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I have been given so much that I should give in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in my last year of medical school, training to care for children and adults.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should be given a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help our employees when they get ready to retire and what they are entitled to as far as benefits and an annuity.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: I respect and admire people who attempt to start their own business, especially in the most difficult of circumstances.  It is very hard work and so very risky.  I feel connected to my lendees and pray for their success.  And I'm deeply moved every time I receive an email alerting me that another payment has been made.  It gives me hope for them and for the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small business making jewelry from sea glass.  Sea Glass is the bits of polished glass that can be found along the shores of lakes and oceans that comes from discarded glass items that have been tossed into the sea.  The glass is pounded by the waves and polished by the sand until it is a beautifully, smooth, "semi-precious" stone.

lenders.name: Jacquelynn
lenders.loan_because: Unlike charitable aid, these microloans actually make a difference for the struggling local economies in which they are given. Just a few dollars from my pocket can make the difference not only for the one person who receives the loan, but ultimately for his family, his neighbors and his country.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and develop webpages and training materials about technological topics for a university.

lenders.name: Kwabena
lenders.loan_because: To help with the most challenging issue of our society "World Poverty".  Power of Micro-financing.
lenders.occupational_info: Janitor

lenders.name: Leila
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we can change the world and provide for a better future. I have had a heart for Africa almost my entire life..I'm not even sure why. My dream is to one day move to Africa and work in health care as a nurse practitioner.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital diagnosing and treating illness. I help make sick people well through medicine and other treatments. I am also completing my clinical doctorate so that I have even more knowledge to offer my patients.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed enough so that I can.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I know how it feels to want to start a business but not have the money to do it.  I want someone else to have the wonderful feeling of owning something that they are proud of and doing what they love to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Children's clothing and gift sales.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: too little is done for the small businesses around this world. They are often overlooked and under appreciated, though they are what drive communities and impact individuals everyday. I want to help in every way I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an engineer, trying to make medical advancements possible. In my spare time I mentor elementary school children in math and science.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a part of someone's life who is far away.  I've grown up in middle class America, where, on the outside, no one struggles finacially.  I want to give someone else that chance of fiscal stability that I have enjoyed for most of my life.  I will help my brothers and sisters, all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student who is going to go to medical school and hopefully be a doctor to the world through organizations like Partners In Health or Doctors Without Borders.

lenders.name: Carmen
lenders.occupational_info: Fun!

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: "In every community there is work to be done. In every nation there are wounds to heal. In every heart, there is power to do it." -Marianne Williamson
lenders.occupational_info: I am a dental hygienist and I am hoping to be in dental school within the next few years.

lenders.name: Equipment Controls Co.
lenders.loan_because: Everyone that has the desire and is willing to put forth the effort to succeed, earns the opportunity to reach their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company distributes measurement and control products for natural gas thoughout the United States and Mexico.

lenders.name: Paulett
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone realize their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a community activist/volunteer working primarily to help children with problems in reading, health, appreciation of music and the arts.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of all people. If given the chance, they will do the right thing.
lenders.occupational_info: Help poor urban students attend college

lenders.name: Lila
lenders.occupation: Crisis Center for Mothers with Children
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an awesome vehicle to help people from all over the world help themselves! People who I would otherwise never have the opportunity to assist!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom who has the time to volunteer and I operate a center for homeless mothers and their children who are seeking self-sufficiency

lenders.name: janice
lenders.loan_because: It is better to give to all of GODS children..
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for car company, bulding heavy dudy trucks.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are working toward economic independence for themselves and their families. Through KIVA I can help people no matter where they live in the World. What a great feeling!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired Special Needs teacher. Now I spend a lot of my time taking care of my four grandsons, ages 7, 9, 11 and 14.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: Because I (just by luck)  was fortunate enought to be born to a loving/monetarily stable family in the United States.

lenders.name: Alberto
lenders.loan_because: Years ago I had a dream, so I asked my Dad for help and a little bit of magic to change my life. Today; I have what I asked for it.  Now is my turn to give it back to those in need. (My dad died 30 + yrs ago, and I'm still asking for his magic)
lenders.occupational_info: I support different programs within my company.

lenders.name: Candee
lenders.loan_because: When we are blessed with bounty, it is only right to share and help those in need,
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a short-term psychiatric hospital for children under 18.

lenders.name: Shankar
lenders.loan_because: I always wanted to help poor people who are need of help.This gives me happiness and a peaceful sleep.To see a happy face gives me more happiness and satisfaction.

lenders.name: Ismail Charania
lenders.loan_because: I like the way loan applicant pays back.
lenders.occupational_info: I would give something back to the people of third world, as a I belong to one.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: Even the smallest thing can change a life and ripple out to others.  I want to make that difference because so many have done so much for me in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I have retired from paid work.  I now volunteer at a domestic violence agency, a Massachusetts conservation program and at a program caring for children in Romania.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: what goes around comes around.  Pass it forward.

lenders.name: Carlee
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone make a better life for themselves.  We all need help sometime in our life, that is why God gave us each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I help, encourage, and support my husband and am dedicated to raising my children in a way that honors the Lord.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: someday I may need to ask for assistance
lenders.occupational_info: for my living, I qualitiy check computer monitoring software; for myself, I create metal jewelry and objects

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because: Because being a single mother there are alot of hardships but I do understand that by giving God rewards and blesses the little you have.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful oppertunity to help others attain a better life.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: Loaning through KIVA is like planting seeds all over the world.  By coming together to make loans we become like a forest rather than an individual tree.
lenders.occupational_info: Taught mentally retared children.  Now retired, enjoy travel, long walks, reading, fishing, meeting new people, finding ways to help others.

lenders.name: Jaime
lenders.loan_because: someone else needs my $25 more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to try to make things look nice, whether it's a brochure, a website or a canvas.

lenders.name: Tonya
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a blessing to others outside of the US.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach computers and business to 14-18 year old students.

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women in foreign countries become self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: Just lending a helping hand to other women.

lenders.name: Marie, James & Allie
lenders.loan_because: We love helping people improve their own lives through owning their own business
lenders.occupational_info: Marie helps people save for their retirement and James is a manager for a retail hardware store. Allie is a high school student

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: it is a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: rehabilitation nursing for spinal cord injured people.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic idea. What a great way to help others. Everyone should do this!
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee a platoon of security officers servicing our Municipal Social Housing communities

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: These folks deserve a hand up& I am grateful to be able to help them get there [I once struggled too!]. Its the right thing to do..bless them all!
lenders.occupational_info: My proudest achievement is raising my 2 wonderful children into compassionate,honest & productive adults.I live with my husband& many rescued dogs&cats.I enjoy reading,cooking,knitting&crafts,&make money with occasional translations.

lenders.name: WAYNE
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me & my family and I feel it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I had to take early retirement due to illness

lenders.name: Ginger
lenders.loan_because: You need it and you are worthy. I believe it to be my responsibility to help others in their time of need. If I was not helped, I would not be able to return the favor now.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people cover the risks they face and help them plan for their future.

lenders.name: Colin, MIchelle, and Cole
lenders.occupation: parents teaching a child the importance of giving

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help someone else and Kiva is a great organization!

lenders.name: Nikki
lenders.loan_because: I feel that even though I cant do much, by helping one person it can make a difference for them and for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a representitive for a ski apparel company, I deal with retail shops directly to distribute our clothing line and help teach the sales associates about the products.

lenders.name: Delores
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and enjoy helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people pay their traditional home mortgage in 1/2 the time or less with a special software package I sell.

lenders.name: Cindi
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my own life.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: We all should be of service to each other. It warms my heart to help those in need. Especially those who are trying so hard and just need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have been a Fine Art - Documentary
Photographer for 28 yrs. I have been an Entreprenur as well since 1993

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Renaissance literature

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: I like knowing that my money is being put to good use, and that the entrepreneurs' lives who receive these loans are bettered by it. I think it is cool how they don't just receive money, which takes no effort on their part, but they are simply given a starting hand; it is up to them where to go with it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: It's a privilege to share, and it's exciting to help a business grow!
lenders.occupational_info: I assist faculty members with academic leaves and with travel grants to present their research at conferences.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to help - you never lose! and so much is gained.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find information on anything they need--finding jobs, finding recreational reading, finding names for their babies, and much much more.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good. We are here to help others.  These gifts make an impact on someone's life. Pay it forward!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in the Financial Services industry

lenders.name: Gilbert
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this idea.
lenders.occupational_info: Engage in SAP utility industry projects

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard you have to work to survive. I don't have much, no one has ever helped me, but I want to help someone.
lenders.occupational_info: My sewing is my life. I make very well made, affordable doll clothes, each a one of a kind.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the helping spirit of women, who willingly lend a hand, heart, or whatever is needed to their sisters, wherever they might live across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from the mental health profession. In private practice for over 25 years, I treated individuals, couples, and families, hoping to guide them to happier and more productive paths in their relationships and in their lives in general.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I  hope I can share some wealth with deserving people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Autistic children and help them learn to live somewhat independently in this world.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I am a citizen of the world and do what I can to help make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: Working in the Arts..producing art shows, promoting artists.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: This is in memory of the most wonderful dad in the world.  I love you and miss you.

lenders.name: Vivian
lenders.loan_because: I respect hard work and it makes me happy to give someone an opportunity to help themselves, their family and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an office and provide assistance to employees of my company who have questions about their benefits.

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: It is a blessing to sow seeds.

lenders.name: Diana
lenders.loan_because: it is a wonderful opportunity to help someone help themselves, and it is incredibly affordable.  I love the feeling I could help!
lenders.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to be retired and I entertain myself watching my grandchildren and reading and doing needlework.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I oversee the operations of a preschool. I am fortunate to have the opportunity to make a difference in the lives of young children every day.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: we all deserve a chance to better ourselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with disabilities find work. And at night I work in a coffee shop.

lenders.name: Nick & Monik
lenders.loan_because: if you can help someone, why not do it?
lenders.occupational_info: We are French Canadians,Nick is a College Professor.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it's fun.
lenders.occupational_info: i am studying to become a doctor.

lenders.name: Bob
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and in this small way maybe I can help someone else have a better life.

lenders.name: terese
lenders.loan_because: I believe in hard work and independence and helping people help themselves out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I care for children ages 3-12 in a very large, predominately poor suburban elementary school

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: because i enjoy goiving more than i take.
lenders.occupational_info: well i don't work because i'm only in the 9th grade. i'm not old enough to work just yet. but i'm doing this because i'm doing fundraising.

lenders.name: Michael F. Deschenes
lenders.occupation: Pre-Cast Quality Control + Handcraft Wire Jewelry
lenders.loan_because: The possibilities of that person that I make a loan to may succeed enough to allow him or her to loan to someone less fortunate than themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: During the day I inspect concrete products like manholes, bridges,box culverts. During the evening i handcraft wire jewelry from14kt rolled gold for my home based business.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: If we live in gratitude by giving freely and from the heart, we will receive the same.

lenders.name: alan
lenders.loan_because:
We're all brothers and sisters...

My favorite quote...

"A whisper can be stronger, as an atom is stronger, than a whole mountain." 
Louise Nevelson
lenders.occupational_info: My job is incredibly fun, and I'm very grateful for the ability and outlet.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I admire these people that work so hard to make a living for their family.  I feel blessed to be able to directly contribute to their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of premature and very sick newborn babies.

lenders.name: memory of Gandenla
lenders.loan_because: people helping people get a start towards their dreams is the best feeling in the world!

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others out
lenders.occupational_info: Deliver mail to the people  for the Postal Service.

lenders.name: ghaiss
lenders.loan_because: it's the least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an engineer, but I manufacture wood seating for wholesale.

lenders.name: True
lenders.loan_because:
I have been a single mom for much of my adult life, raising two sons on my own. I was very much an entrepeneur--making jewelry, doing graphic design, sewing, whatever I could do--to feed my kids. 

I want to help other mothers to get on their feet. I am grateful to have the opportunity to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I design books, websites, CDs. I also make jewelry.

lenders.name: Lynn and Craig
lenders.occupation: Lead Teacher Primrose School So. Tampa
lenders.loan_because: When I help anyone I feel on top of the world.  Not only am I helping make a difference in this world, I am also making a difference in my life!
lenders.occupational_info: I have a school for children ages 3 - 5 and also take care of children ages 6 weeks - 3 years.  Best job in the world!!!

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: It is a good feeling to help someone for so little.  God has blessed me, therefore I believe each person should a chance to live a better life for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from Healthcare Industry.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I was there and someone helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: Being the best wife, friend, neighbor, mom, tutu, great-tutu & person I can be.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference.

lenders.name: Samiyah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in doing unto others, as I would have them do unto me.  I loan because I believe every  person on this planet has a purpose and that it is our duty as human beings to assist each other in achieving our purpose.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist. I get to feel for the world, I get to entertain the world.

lenders.name: Superiorgal
lenders.loan_because: It is an opportunity to give back a small portion of all our abundance!  There is great joy in being able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am comitted to my family and spend my days overseeing the affairs of my household.  I also am privileged to teach my two children at home.  This is my contribution to the future---to train up this young generation in the way they should go!  They are the leaders of tomorrow.

lenders.name: michelle
lenders.loan_because: I desire to empower women all over the world. Plus, it's so darn fun!

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy being involved in making this world become a better place to live

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because:
this is a great way to learn geography and economics
and become attached to the people of the earth. A 
family could do this together and change their
children's perspective towards others.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I prefer to offer a "hand up" over simply a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: My hobby is my work... I collect postage stamps, and sell the extra ones on eBay.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Jon & Shantel
lenders.loan_because: We have had many blessings in our lives and we give because it is rewarding to see how someone’s life can be improved with very little.  It makes us happy to know we are helping make a difference.

lenders.name: Les Drake
lenders.loan_because: I believe small groups of people build economically strong communities, rather than large institutions who are not  accountable to the community.
lenders.occupational_info: heath care data analysis

lenders.name: Azucena
lenders.loan_because: i want to start my own business.

lenders.name: Len & Pat
lenders.loan_because: are you kidding.  this is great....
lenders.occupational_info: tax and travel why not help someone

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I have been so blessed in my life I feel compelled to share my blessings. As Mother Theresa says "Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work."
lenders.occupational_info: An RN is a nurse that has completed a course of study and passed the proper examinations to become licensed and registered.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: It feels good!  And I have seen how small things can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I talk on the radio.  Really.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because:
(1) It is always time to give back. 
(2) The stories remind me of people I've met and known along this glorious journey called life.
lenders.occupational_info: I know what it's like to need just a little more money to make your dreams come true. I have been inspired by others' profound generosity to me in my times of need. Between 2002 and 2007, $100 would change my life dramatically; now I can only hope that it can do some good for others.

lenders.name: Tristan
lenders.loan_because: It is my responsibility to use what I have been given to help others.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I am finally in a position to help someone else. I believe in pay it forward...
lenders.occupational_info: I make people's pets look and feel better.Being in an animal hospital,I have alot of clients that are older and in bad health,so I try to make them feel better by being clean and looking good.

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone life!!!

lenders.name: Laraine
lenders.loan_because: We need to all support each other throughout the world. We are all human beings and we all deserve a chance. And this is a small way I can help to be part of the solution, not the problem.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nurse in an emergency room in a big city. We take care of the very rich and very poor. I love to make a difference in people's lives with excellent patient care.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: We all need to do whatever we can in whatever way we can to help each other. A loan like these are easy, the people we loan to probably help others in may other ways. We all do what we can do.
lenders.occupational_info: I love photography and manipulating images using a computer. I love capturing images of people, nature, scenics.  The view in a big city like this is very limited, yet all around us is the art of nature in every tree, flower, mountain, sky and face.  I love trying to capture a glimpse of that art and beauty with a camera.

lenders.name: Cooper
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the 2nd grade.  I love school.  I love math and reading.  I like to help other children.  I also like to save my money.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.occupation: Public School Teacher and single mother of 2 girls

lenders.name: Anita
lenders.loan_because: we are blessed and would like to extend a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep tally of where money is being earned and spent.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I think we should help one another when we can.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school every weekday from 9 am to 2:40 pm and take 6 classes: English, Spanish, Math, US History, Environmental Science and a course on Modern Africa.

lenders.name: Gabriele
lenders.loan_because:
I came a long way from being in a battered women's shelter with an eight year old son.
I like to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a home that I am sharing with 6 persons in need of care.

lenders.name: Susan & family
lenders.loan_because: I hope it will give someone the ability to provide for themself through a successful business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Director of a recreational facility for senior adults over the age of 55.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I got my biz going because of help, so its only right I pay it forward
lenders.occupational_info: I produce straight to video documentaries and now I'm producing TV shows. Google "JayGee Ent. Jason)

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I'm tired of feeling like a hypocrite who always says "we really should help people in need more".  I've decided it's time to do something however small it may be.
lenders.occupational_info: I do rehabilitation and phyical therapy at an orthopaedic surgeon's office

lenders.name: Nilanjana
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes this simple.

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: I can.  At this time in my life, it selfishly makes me feel good to give.  I love Mexico and visit there often.  I look around at the opulence of the resorts, then at the homes of the real Mexican people and think -- how can I give back other than spending tourist dollars.  Thanks to Kiva, Oprah and President Clinton for making me aware of this website!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with hospitals implementing new computer systems, or upgrading their current ones.

lenders.name: Veronica
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people!

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone with a hand up not a hand out.  These people seem to want to try to make a better life for themselves and I want to help them do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I determine the value of property so that lenders can decide how much to loan an investor to buy the property.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because:
Good goes around.
As a small business owner, I know the value of a loan. Thank you Kiva for making it easy to make a difference in this world!
lenders.occupational_info: Besides travel, my husband and I are manufacturers of scones, shortbread and biscuits. We turned our dream into a reality and are pleased to partner with other budding entrepreneurs around the world.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: As a retired entrepreneur who was a single mother to 3 children, I know first hand how difficult it is at times. I hope that my small contribution will help another deserving woman reach the success that I did, both professionally & in raising my children who became very successful and happy adults. I am now at a time in my life to give back...Hopefully I will set an example to others. What a privilege this is! God Bless you women!
lenders.occupational_info: Before I retired, I put myself through college at night while working a full time job and raising 3 children. I was an Accountant who always had another type of endeavor going at the same time; ranging from  selling cosmetics door to door; to owning a house cleaning business; to owning my own Accounting Firm. I had to work very hard and made many sacrifices to get where I am today.

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: Why not!  If I can help in any way, then I will.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help others.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: It is gratifying to see these business people working hard to help themselves.  I am very happy to be a part of an endeavor by someone who wants to help themselves with a ligitimate business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but work part-time from home as a comptroller for a small firm that investigates death claims for insurance companies.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: It is my hope that everyone can feel the power & joy of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I mentor, motivate and look for jobs for other people.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at home caring for my daughter.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who do not have the opportunities that we have in the United States.  I respect their hard work.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: it helps people who want to help themselves.  To be self-sufficient is empowering.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: I admire and identify with a woman who is overcoming challenges in her life and does so by way of fabric and thread.
lenders.occupational_info: My interest is in english smocking, quilting and bobbin lace.

lenders.name: Krissy
lenders.loan_because: I take for granted every day what I have and how fortunate I am. I would like to give something back
lenders.occupational_info: I make loans for a living...but it's not as rewarding as this

lenders.name: Dee
lenders.loan_because: Helping can be overwhelming and this site makes it so easy.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an actress in LA on TV and films.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I loan because we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Software development and photography.

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because:
It's important to lend a helping hand and by doing so it makes the world a better place.

“The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.” 
   -- Mahatma Gandhi
